reviews.review_text: What a steal!!! A brand new laptop under $250! I have an older Dell laptop that is over 9 years old. Still runs but is slower and cannot be upgraded to Windows 11. Enter Walmart. It has everything I need. Set up was a breeze. And talk about fast, my old Dell would take about 5 minutes to start up. My new laptop within seconds. Thanks Walmart for offering a great product at a phenomenal price!

It allows you to use a complicated password with letters and numbers I like that and it is a very inexpensive but fast computer and you can use a security key with it like with the most computers you can't really upgrade its memory, but like I said you can use a security key like an USB drive. I like to get one with a flashing indicator light so you know it's working and you can download your files videos and pictures and documents and you can also if you like get upgrade using a Groupon to a professional permanent 2024 for a Windows someday in the future for 1799. I did that with an old inspire on with a one terabyte drive yesterday but so this one has a one year opportunity for windows so I don't need to do that but you'll like it very much and it was always so expensive. I'm really only paying like nine dollars a month for it for maybe 18 months that's it's an inexpensive computer for sure and then you own it for years, so good luck.

I'm leaving this review for people like me who needed a laptop that could carry them through school and then some. I needed something reliable with an interface I can navigate cause Apple does too much and this laptop was perfect. I've already sent the link to two sisters and my mom! Get this!!! 10/10

reviews.title: Never Again. (Will not remain powered off!)
reviews.review_text: Never again. Never another Lenovo. Good value but it has its quirks, which makes it quite unsuitable for travel. Even when powered fully off and with clamshell closed, laptop will turn itself back on! Don't know if it sits in sleep or hibernation but it does drain the battery! Useless. I expect when I fully power off a laptop for it to stay off! This apparently is a known problem for Lenovo laptops. (I normally have purchased ASUS machines). Also, I had an absolutely brilliant Dell machine with the same specs, at lower cost, and its battery would last 14-16 hours! (not just 4 as with this Lenovo).

reviews.title: Horrible syestem and service
reviews.review_text: So I bought this for my son to do summer school on. So when i opened it i turned it on and waited. A screen popped up asking for a code to start the computer. In which i had no clue why i needed a code or where to get it. Went to return the computer tonight very rude customer service employees and they wouldnt take my return. I got the computer on affirm in which I'm still paying for. Had to call Affirm and they was asking me why Walmart wouldn't take my return. So Affirm is doing an investigation now. I cant do anything with this device and its useless to me.

Worst part of the laptop is the battery life, I can only use it maybe 2-4 hours before it dies, and it takes quite a while to charge. The laptop itself is super slow, it is not the internet, but the laptop itself. When using Xcel or Word, it often just freezes. The touchpad is so sensitive I have to use a mouse which is not a big deal but if I'm on the go makes it a challenge. It was easy to set up and does the bare minimum but if that's what you are looking for there are more affordable options out there. Very disappointed!

reviews.title: Pick it up in person
reviews.review_text: Not for the laptop but for the delivery experience from the vender laptop is a fine laptop Lenovo designs great products vender is absolutely horrible with shipping

reviews.title: INCORRECT POWER CHORD!!!
reviews.review_text: I RECEIVED THIS LAPTOP FOR MY DAUGHTERS BIRTHDAY, AND IT CAME WITH THE WRONG POWER CHORD!!! IT WAS HER TENTH YEAR BIRTHDAY!! I KNOW HAVE BUY ANOTHER LAPTOP!!!I'M VERY UNHAPPY!! RICHARD
when ipening laptop and turning it on it is saying needs a recovoey key cod it does not come with a recovory key code so there it is no used to me. i dont know where to get a key code.

reviews.title: TRASH TRASH TRASH
reviews.review_text: This computer is TRASH!!! Its so slooooooow. You will NEVER get any work completed. Biggest mistake of my life. Now I have to restart a allstate class because of this trash. Yea RUN!!!! It took 2 hours to erase all my info and reinstall back to factory. They could have utilized this much better than this.

reviews.title: Need to chat, look stuff up online or do a paper!
reviews.review_text: I mostly use my desktop in my personal area to chat, watch movies/youtube and play games on. When I am out with the family the bat seams to last few hours tho i keep it plugged in mostly. The laptop allows me to do most my stuff other then gaming, but hey I am out with the family to spend time with them and not focus on my game... LOL.. This has just enough power to run smoothly for video calls and group chats with out being over powered for what I use it for... I am suggesting this to a friend who has a young child so they can do there school stuff on it, while at school or at home.
Wonderful laptop purchased for my 11 yr old as a backup for homeschool. Would definitely purchase again. Shipping was fast, and delivery was amazing with this item.

reviews.title: DISGUSTED NO CUSTOMER SERVICE
reviews.review_text: item received is not as ordered i tried calling customer service 6 times got people in foreign countries that dont understand english and when i asked to speak to someone in US i was told they could not connect me

reviews.title: bitlocker recovery key
reviews.review_text: after only a couple months the computer shut down and is asking for a bitlock recovery key. It's going to cost us to have it fixed. Apparently some kind of stupid problem with Microsoft.

reviews.title: S mode beware
reviews.review_text: I bought this specifically to type %26 print the many documents I'm working on, so the free Microsoft for a yr is a huge plus. However, because of the S mode, I was not able to connect to a printer/copier that I need. Even downloading a program from the Microsoft store did not work. Very frustrating!! After a couple hrs of frustration I finally was able to remove the S mode %26 my printer connected with no issues. I would imagine that a person needing all the bells %26 whistles can connect with wireless thermal printer and this product would be great for them.

reviews.title: BALANCED USEFUL PRODUCT
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] IT IS A PRODUCT THAT RESPONDS VERY WELL TO MY NEEDS. BALANCED AND ACCESSIBLE IN RELATION TO PRICE QUALITY. IT WAS A LITTLE LOW WHEN INSTALLING IT, MAYBE A LITTLE MORE RAM MEMORY WOULD BE OPTIMAL, BUT IN ANY CASE IT DOES VERY WELL FOR USE IN ADMINISTRATIVE TASKS.

reviews.title: Good for the price
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] You can't beat the price and for the most part it is a good laptop but it is a little slow to boot up. Perhaps I did not get enough memory but it seems to be slow when doing certain things on the internet.

reviews.title: IdeaPad is the BEST
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] My IdeaPad is so reliable and fast. It works like a charm when I really need it most for my games and work life. Thank you for making such an awesome piece of hardware. All the best to the Lenovo team.

reviews.title: Speed and Convenience
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I own four Lenovo products. I always check out the sales because I know I will get a durable product at an even more excellent price. My new Abyss Blue machine is lightweight and sleek. The keypad has large keys that makes it easy to type without getting tired.

reviews.title: False advertising
reviews.review_text: The product itself functions as expected and meets my requirements. However, my low rating is due to the seller's misleading advertisement. The listing claimed that a 12-month Microsoft 365 subscription was included, but this was not the case. I attempted to contact the seller multiple times to resolve the issue but received no response.

reviews.title: Slow and poor screen resolution
reviews.review_text: Noticeably slower than what I'm used to on my MacBook. But I can live with that. What really upsets me is how poor the screen resolution is. Reading text is hard because it's almost blurry. I'm getting used to it, but it was jarring when I first purchased it. Worth paying more for a better laptop if you can.

reviews.title: Absolutely Wonderful piece of technology.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The size of the idea pad is idea for my commute to and from work, it fits in all of my work bags and is ideal for my online classes. The cost of the laptop was also a plus ad I was on a very tight budget in a short period of time and it was a life saver. Just a few days ago I was thinking of possibly purchasing a tablet to make reading all of my course material a bit easier on my commute home as it's ideal sitting with a laptop on public transportation.

reviews.title: Perfect for casual users
reviews.review_text: For the price, this is a fantastic entry level laptop for basic needs. With that said, It is by far not the fastest or slowest laptop on the market. It is intended for work, homework, to watch YouTube, make a spreadsheet... use outlook. It is not intended for..., games, high end software that is resource demanding, demanding photo editing... music creation software. Anyways i think i got the point across. Going forward...it is slim and lightweight, has a very nice and bright display, decent webcam, enough ports for what you need, fast charging...and a one year subscription to Microsoft 365 for free. its what i needed for my travels and didnt dent my budget hardly at all. would recommend for students and casual users.
Price was very good as I had shopped around, and the set up of the PC was very easy.
The product was great, but it was delivered to the wrong house, this makes me mad. the delivery people need to look at house numbers when making deliceries
Just stop working with blue screen with keycode message i know nothing about. won't let me log into computer

reviews.title: Looking forward to using this product
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I bought this model as a starter for my grandson who is entering high school. We haven't had a lot of time to test the performance of the computer; however, what we have seen is exactly what we needed. I would not have looked at this particular model with the expert help of the chat representative. She helped me determine that that the specs on the computer will not only be be acceptable for his online work but also for his movie making. I am looking forward to exploring all the features of this product. The price was the seller point. I was able to get a great processor for a very reasonable amount of money.

reviews.title: IdeaPad
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I absolutely love this IdeaPad! It is very sleek and lightweight. I bought this for nursing school because we need to take it to class for lecture. It holds a charge for my entire 6 hour class and longer! I would definitely recommend this over other brands that charge over a $1000! I would buy this IdeaPad again and again for all of my family! I love it!

reviews.title: Great purchase
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Lenovo Idea 1i is a great laptop! The 14â€ size is perfect this is a Christmas present for my husband and he is a light user and this machine is more than adequate for his needs. The price was amazing!

reviews.title: Bad communications with shipping delay
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I like the laptop, I just didn't like the lack of communication in the delayed shipping of the laptop to me. It took a month from date of purchase to receive the laptop and the original shipping date was 2 weeks after purchase.

reviews.title: Very pleased
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This computer does everything I was looking for. With only a work laptop previously, I needed a personal laptop to be able to store personal files and manage my household finances, school enrollments, etc. and this has done the job beautifully.

reviews.title: Would love more with buttons on trackpad
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I am used to using buttons on a mousepad or trackpad to be able to do many things. This laptop doesn't have them. It's very difficult to highlight something to copy and paste it so I took two stars away from what would have been a five star review. I use this for school work and it's very frustrating to highlight more than a word.

reviews.title: Lenovo makes quality products
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I am only a month into my new Lenovo and so far it is great. Startup and battery life is amazing. The operating system is smooth and I can take care of my general online activities. I have yet to stream and I am not a gamer, so this was a perfect choice for me. This is my third Lenovo after a tablet and smart clock. Love the brand.

reviews.title: Decent computer especially for college-level work.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a great laptop for my purposes. I do a lot of school-related work, work from home work, and streaming shows. My only complaint is it seems to glitch occasionally and my last computer never had this kind of issue. It's nothing major, simply annoying when it happens.

reviews.title: Great Little Workhorse
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I purchased the Ideapad 1i for on-the-road light work and writing. I had a very nice Chromebook for the same purpose, but it just didn't have the features, power, and compatibility I needed. It loads quickly and runs the Office suite very nicely. As a guy with wide shoulders, it was nice to find something that wasn't so small that it hurt my wrists and shoulders but not so large as to be cumbersome while traveling. Much better performance than a Chromebook and for a comparable price.
